item.title: Failed to open stream: DrupalTemporaryStreamWrapper::stream_open
item.description: From CLI This error is shown: 1failed to open stream: "DrupalTemporaryStreamWrapper::stream_open" call failed file.inc:1983 Solution Seems to be an issue with the temp file. Check "drush st" and confirm if the temp file is still accessible. This gives some hints on how to set the "temp and private files" in drupal setttings https://www.drupal.org/forum/support/installing-drupal/2011-03-01/failed-to-open-stream-drupaltemporarystreamwrapperstream#comment-4258986 However, my test showed using "/tmp" doesn't seem to reflected in drupal.
